author: Craft Computing
description:
Grab yourself a Pint Glass at https://craftcomputing.store

I've used Trackballs since the 90s, and always preferred they to standard mice. But it wasn't until 2018 that I finally found a trackball that completely replaced mice for me... The Elecom HUGE is the perfect combination of comfort, ergonomics and customization, and I've never looked back. But as good as it was, I've been wanting some more modern features in my ancient mouse tech, like 3-mode wireless, a replaceable cable, and better bearings for the trackball itself. That want is finally a reality with the new Elecom HUGE Plus.

But first... What am I drinking???

Mortalis Brewing (Avon, NY) Beer Nerds (6.0%)

Check out the new Elecom Huge Plus here: https://elecomusa.com/products/huge-plus
Or the original Huge over on Amazon: https://amzn.to/4suKOMS
I'm also a fan of the Elecom Deft Pro: https://amzn.to/3LoPlzx

Follow me on Bluesky @CraftComputing.bsky.social

Support me on Patreon and get access to my exclusive Discord se
title: My favorite mouse got an upgrade! - Elecom Huge Plus
